prompt: Create a vibrant onboarding screen with a pink gradient background (from Colors.pink[400] to Colors.pink[100]). Feature a rounded square illustration at the top (using a Container with 16px border radius) occupying 30% of the screen height, filled with a soft white (Colors.white70). Place a pink icon (Icons.music_note, size 90) in the center. Below, add a bold heading in white (font size 24px, FontWeight.w800) with the text 'Feel the Beat'. Include a subtitle in light pink (Colors.pink[200], font size 14px) describing the appâ€™s music features. At the bottom, include a pink 'Start Vibing' button (Colors.pink[600], 10px radius) and a 'Skip' text button in white. Use 20px padding, center-align text, and add 16px spacing for a lively, energetic look.
